text: Hagi Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzana Israeli vahe Anumzamo'a huno, Jerusalemi kumate'ene, Juda mopafima me'nea kuma taminte'ma knazama atrogeno'ma eme zamazeri havizama hu'neana, ko keta antahita hu'naze. Hagi antahiho, menima kesazana ana kuma tamimo'a havizantfa hazageno, anampina magore hu'za vahera omani'naze.
